label: 大宰府
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: 1. Government Headquarters in Kyūshū.   A headquarters (fu) in charge of the government of the Saikaidō. Its offices were located in Mikasa-no-kōri, Chikuzen-no-kuni.↓2. The town in which the above was located, and the surrounding country nearby.↓[九州、府、西海道、三笠郡、筑前国]
